TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ImplementationVisibility extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the visibility modes within a tracking profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tracking records from activities that are contained within another activity can be filtered using the visibility modes described by **ImplementationVisibility**. The filter is applied to subscribe for tracking records for all activities or only the root activity and its implementation for a workflow. For more information, see <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ImplementationVisibility%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Tracking.ImplementationVisibility All = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Tracking.ImplementationVisibility RootScope = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Only the root activity and its implementation for the workflow is emitted.
